#summary How to use nacl-strip to reduce .nexe size

= Introduction =

nacl-strip is a binary that will compress your .nexe files.  This helps reduce latency when they are loaded from a web host.  The nacl-strip binary is contains in the !NaCl SDK toolchain directory, which also contains nacl-g++.

= Details =

Basic usage is very simple.  For example, if we have a .nexe file named hello_world_x86_32.nexe, we can create a stripped version named hello_world_s_x86_32.nexe with this command line:

{{{
  nacl-strip hello_world_x86_32.nexe -o hello_world_s_x86_32.nexe
}}}
